product_info.title: ZD621-HC 4-INCH DESKTOP PRINTERS
product_info.description:
--- Page 1 ---
PRODUCT SPEC SHEET
ZD621-HC 4-INCH DESKTOP PRINTERS
ZD621-HC 4-inch Desktop Printers
Premium features, maximum performance and unmatched security for
years of quality printing in healthcare environments
You need a premium, quality healthcare printer that’s built to perform flawlessly—day in and day out. Rely on Zebra’s ZD621
healthcare desktop printers, built specifically for healthcare, and advancing the proven and popular ZD620 printers. Don’t
compromise. Get it all: an innovative new architecture to power our ever-expanding printer capabilities and software.
Healthcare-specific engineering with disinfectant-ready plastics, UV-resistant and medical-grade power supply. Unmatched security
that’s constantly evolving to shield you from cyberattacks and safeguard your sensitive data, including patient information. A new
standard 4.3-in., full-color LCD touch display with intuitive menu. Enhanced features, communication and field-installable
media-handling options. And, increased remote- management capabilities. Together, these give you outstanding print performance,
years of optimal use, industry-leading reliability and unparalleled intelligence and security to keep you moving forward.
Designed for Healthcare
Easy to Clean, Sanitize and Safely Power
Disinfectant-ready plastics, UV-resistant housing and a sealed-
button interface make the ZD621 healthcare printers easy to
clean and sanitize, helping prevent the spread of infections in
hospitals and clinics. And, the power supply is IEC 60601-1
compliant for use in healthcare facilities.
Expect the Best
Premier Printing Performance
Rely on the ZD621 to help you power through—day after day.
From industry-leading print speeds to portability for
Elevating a Proven Winner
application flexibility to emerging technology to
field-installable options, the ZD621 stands apart. Available in
Extending the ZD-Series Legacy direct thermal and thermal transfer healthcare models, and a
Zebra’s ZD620 Series printers are known for quality, premium RFID model*, the ZD621 supports a wide variety of
performance. As you select your next printer, you can be healthcare-specific use cases and requirements.
confident the next-generation ZD621 includes everything you
loved in those legacy printers, and builds on this heritage to Operate with Ease
deliver best-in-class features for this new era of intelligence
and forward adaptability.
Simple to Deploy, Use, Manage and Secure
Backed by Zebra’s innovative Print DNA software suite, the
ZD621 is incredibly simple to operate.
The ZD621 — Premium print quality, features and reliability.
Ready for tomorrow’s healthcare needs.
For more information, please visit www.zebra.com/zd621-healthcare
--- Page 2 ---

Connect Your Way with Comprehensive Communication Explore Managed Print Services (MPS)

networks or connect it directly to any PC. Every ZD621 comes
with Ethernet, Serial, USB 2.0 and USB Host, or add an optional

Supplies, Service and Support
The Features You Need, When You Need
Zebra Certified Supplies
Them
Printing supplies provide a digital voice for assets across your
supply chain. You rely on them to disseminate critical data
Turn Your ZD621 Into a Portable Printer
throughout your organization. That’s why we design, produce
Easily transport your ZD621 healthcare printer on a cart or and rigorously pretest our own line of labels, tags and receipt
with Zebra’s optional carrying case, using the battery option. paper to ensure consistent, optimized performance in your
Print on- the-spot to reduce steps, increase productivity, and Zebra printer. For industry-leading quality, service and thermal
improve task accuracy. Power through a full shift with the printing expertise, choose Zebra Certified Supplies.
high-capacity battery.
Service When You Need It
Zebra OneCare offers unmatched technical support direct
from Zebra, as well as comprehensive repair services. And
Zebra’s Visibility Services provide real-time insights into printer
operations to help optimize printer availability.
